Html:
Hello

I am looking at using D3 for Contour plotting (using IsolineGraph).  However, I am using another library for other plots (sorry!).  Given both are to be in the same application, I am trying to make Zoom and Pan compatible with each other.

E.g. for other charting solution, Zoom area is defined by pressing and holding the left mouse button, and dragging the region.  This is similar to D3, but Shift Left Mouse button is required.

Is it possible to customize this (i.e. by supplying a custom MouseNavigation object)?

Regards

Craig
